(Simplified: 诨)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 軍 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 軍 [ jūn ] army, military; soldiers, troops
①開玩笑，詼諧可笑的話：諢話。諢名(外號)。諢號。
②專以打諢逗趣的人：“思明愛優諢，寢食常在側”。

諢字的基本解释

諢
hùn
见“诨”。

諢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hùn］
［《廣韻》五困切，去慁，疑。］
“诨1”的繁体字。
(1)逗趣的话。
(2)指打诨逗趣的人。
(3)戏谑；开玩笑。
(4)哄骗。

諢字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諢； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1170第01
【廣韻】【集韻】?五困切，兀去聲。弄言也。【唐書·史思明傳】思明愛優諢，寢食常在側。【遼史·伶官傳】打諢得不是黃幡綽。　又諢衣。【雲仙雜記】穆宗以?綃白書，素紗墨書爲衣服，賜承幸宮人，皆淫鄙之詞詩，號諢衣。　又【金壷字考】與顐同。【唐書·元結傳】諧臣顐官，怡愉天顏。

nickname
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hùn］
["Guangyun" five difficulties are cut, distracted, suspicious. ]
Traditional characters for "诨1".
(1) Funny words.
(2) Refers to a person who is ridiculing and funny.
(3) Joking; joking.
(4) Coax.

[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　诨; Kangxi strokes: 16; page number: page 1170 01
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Five difficult cuts, Wu Qusheng. Make a fool of yourself. [Tang Shu·Shi Siming Biography] Siming loves excellent humor, and often sleeps and eats on his side. [Liao History · Acting Official Biography] It was not Huang Fanchuo who ridiculed him.　Yi again. [Miscellaneous Notes of Yunxian] Mu Zong used the white calligraphy of silk and the ink calligraphy as his clothes, and bestowed on the honorable palace people.　[Golden Word Test] Same as Xie. [Tang Shu·Yuan Jie Biography] Harmonious court official, Yiyu Tianyan.
